Overview   Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.epochx.epox.math

Class Summary
AbsoluteFunction A function node which performs the mathematical absolute function, called ABS.
AddFunction A function node which performs the mathematical function of addition.
CoefficientPowerFunction The CoefficientPowerFunction is equivalent to a PowerFunction combined with a MultiplyFunction.
CubeFunction A function node which performs the arithmetic function of cube, that is - raising to the third power.
CubeRootFunction A function node which performs the mathematical function of cube root, called CBRT.
DivisionProtectedFunction A function node which performs the mathematical function of division.
ExponentialFunction A function node which performs the mathematical exponential function e^x where e is the constant known as Euler's number.
FactorialFunction A function node which performs the mathematical function of factorial, which is normally expressed with an exclamation mark ! For example: 5! = 5 x 4 x 3 x 2 x 1 = FACTORIAL 5
GreaterThanFunction A function node which performs the numerical greater than comparison of two numeric inputs, called GT.
InvertProtectedFunction A function node which performs the multiplicative inverse (or reciprocal), that is the inverse of x is 1/x, called INV.
LessThanFunction A function node which performs the numerical less than comparison of two numeric inputs, called LT.
Log10Function A function node which performs the common (base 10) logarithm, called LOG-10.
LogFunction A function node which performs the natural (base e) logarithm.
Max2Function A function node which performs a comparison of two numeric inputs and returns the greater of the two.
Max3Function A function node which performs a comparison of three numeric inputs and returns the greater of the three.
MaxFunction A function node which performs the simple comparison function of determining which of a set of numbers is larger, as per the boolean greater-than function.
Min2Function A function node which performs a comparison of two numeric inputs and returns the smaller of the two.
Min3Function A function node which performs a comparison of three numeric inputs and returns the smallest of the three.
MinFunction A function node which performs the simple comparison function of determining which of a set of numbers is smaller, as per the boolean less-than function.
ModuloProtectedFunction A function node which performs the modulo operation, that is it finds the remainder of division.
MultiplyFunction A function node which performs the mathematical function of multiplication.
PowerFunction A function node which performs the mathematical operation of exponentiation.
SignumFunction A function node which performs the mathematical sign function that extracts the sign of a number.
SquareFunction A function node which performs the arithmetic function of squaring, that is - raising to the second power.
SquareRootFunction A function node which performs the mathematical function of square root, called SQRT.
SubtractFunction A function node which performs the mathematical function of subtract.
